channel.title: Trophy: First Loser (error)
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Trophy: First Loser (error)" - just posting an error found on these wiki pages.

item.title: Trophy: First Loser (error)
item.content:encoded:
While looking up The First Loser trophy(under 10Points tab) in the Trophy section on this wiki,
I noticed you have "Get Second Place in The First Loser" as the requirement for this trophy. This isn't correct.
The requirement to get this trophy is to be a consolation prize winner or basically the first NON-winner. (2nd Place is NOT the first NON-winner)

(since there is a range of winners depending on the amount who entered, the consolation prize winner is never the 2nd highest bid{would require a VERY LOW # of players}.)
(to further instill the idea that 2nd Place is NOT the first NON-winner, someone who bids the 2nd highest bid gets a message saying "You've Placed 2nd in First Loser")
(another thing to notice is that the consolation prize winner will have a bid by their name that either EQUALS{in case of a tie} or is LOWER than the lowest bidding winner)
